Game.Name: Tsuri Kichi Sanpei - Blue Marlin Hen (Japan)
Game.plot: Tsuri Kichi Sanpei: Blue Marlin Hen is a Sports game, published by Victor Interactive Software,which was released in Japan in 1988.Cheat: Special PasswordsStart the game and enter the map mode. There, move the cursor on the letters' grid and press the A Button on certain characters to make passwords as below. (If you mix it up, just get off the letter grid and press A. If you want to enter multiple passwords, reset the console.) Press Start when you're done entering the password.
